emuInput.TitMainTitle: Group portrait of men from Greater Pittsburgh Improvement League and Forbes Field vending company: Thomas A. Anderson, Sam Montain, Myron O'Briskey, Elmer B. Harrison, and James McCoy Jr., posed in office
emuInput.CatDescriptText: Cutline of image published in Pittsburgh Courier newspaper, April 25, 1953, pg. 16, reads: "WORKING OUT DETAILS FOR 30 JOBS - When the Greater Pittsburgh Improvement League secured jobs for thirty vendor concession salesmen who started to work at Forbes Field this week, this group, representing the Greater Pittsburgh Improvement League and the vending company at Forbes Field, worked out the final details. Left to right are Thomas A. Anderson of the GPIL, Sam Montain, union steward; Myron O'Briskey, general manager; Mr. Elmer B. Harrison of the GPIL, and James McCoy Jr., of the GPIL - Harris Photo."
